text_subtitle_aqua_global_passport: AQUA is your global passport to financial inclusion, designed for Latin America and embraced by Bitcoiners everywhere.
section_subtitle_bitcoin_wallet_features: Save in Bitcoin and transact efficiently with Lightning, Liquid, and Tether USDt. Easily swap assets, buy Bitcoin, and much, much more!
feature_card_banking_simple_description: Access diverse financial products, from simple spending and saving in Bitcoin, to advanced options like Prepaid Visa Dolphin Card and lending soon!
feature_card_send_spend_swap_title: Freedom to Send, Spend, and Swap
feature_card_send_spend_swap_description: AQUA makes everyday transactions easy, giving you the power to move money seamlessly and confidentially with low fees and full control.
feature_card_control_money_description: AQUA enables self custody of your keys and assets, ensuring your money is secure and accessible from anywhere, while protecting your privacy.
section_subtitle_usdt_transfers: Sending digital dollars around the world is now cheaper than ever thanks to Tether USDt and the Liquid Network. Don't pay more fees than you need to!
section_subtitle_send_receive_usdt: AQUA enables support for Tether USDt native on Liquid and across the most popular USDt chains.
feature_card_usdt_support_description: With reliable USDt support on major blockchains, you can move dollars globally, avoid volatility, and unlock new financial tools. It's the easiest way to access dollars.
feature_card_access_dollars_title:
Access to Dollars
With Low Fees
feature_card_access_dollars_description: Gain reliable access to USDt without a bank account. AQUA lets you save and spend in dollars opening up financial opportunities for people everywhere.
feature_card_no_gas_token_description: Pay network fees directly in USDt, no additional gas tokens needed. AQUA simplifies stablecoin transactions, giving you maximum flexibility and a seamless experience!
section_title_be_your_own_bank: BE YOUR OWN BANK WITH AQUA
section_subtitle_be_your_own_bank: AQUA's integrated Marketplace allows you to buy self-custodial Bitcoin directly in many regions. Prepaid Visa Dolphin Cards are coming soon as well as peer-to-peer services like lending and bill payments. Everything you need in one app!
section_subtitle_financial_freedom: The first Bitcoin and Liquid wallet with built-in USDt support. Spend cash, save in BTC, protect your privacy, beat inflation, and secure your future, all on a Bitcoin standard. AQUA makes freedom simple.
section_title_dolphin_testimonials: HERE'S WHAT DOLPHINS ARE SAYING ABOUT AQUA
testimonial_peter_mccormack: "Some people want to use Bitcoin and some people want to use Tether. AQUA is the wallet I've been waiting for with Bitcoin, Lightning and Tether."
testimonial_ben_perrin: "This is almost everything I want out of a daily use wallet. Receipts on Onchain, Lightning or Liquid."
testimonial_oliver_koblizek: "This is the wallet my mom would use, no technical hassle. It's a Bitcoin wallet that just works while giving you all the features you expect."
testimonial_hodler615: "As someone who is constantly traveling, mostly to emerging countries, I think AQUA is genius. It solves multiple real-world problems for me."
faq_are_there_limits: Are there any limits on the amount of funds I can send or receive with AQUA?
faq_are_there_limits_answer: AQUA is non-custodial, so there are no restrictions on the amount you can send or receive. The only exception is USDt transfers via Tron or Ethereum, which depend on SideShift's liquidity.
faq_are_tx_rbf: Are AQUA transactions RBF-compatible and how can I adjust fees if necessary?
faq_are_tx_rbf_answer: Yes. AQUA supports Replace-By-Fee (RBF). If a transaction is stuck, you can increase the fee using the RBF option in the app to speed up the transaction.
faq_my_btc_purchase: My Bitcoin purchase in AQUA was rejected or is missing.
faq_my_btc_purchase_answer: Check restrictions. Bitcoin purchases are handled by third-party providers, you might have country-specific restrictions or requirements. If your payment has processed but you didn't receive Bitcoin, contact the provider directly.
faq_how_does_aqua_store_seed: How does AQUA store my seed phrase?
faq_how_does_aqua_store_seed_answer:
AQUA is a non-custodial Bitcoin and Liquid wallet, therefore, it is the user's sole responsibility to safeguard access to funds and the device on which AQUA is installed.

AQUA does not store or have access to seed phrases. These are stored securely on your device using Keychain (iOS) or EncryptedSharePreferences (Android). Users are entirely responsible for safeguarding their recovery phrases.
faq_how_do_i_contact_answer: Visit our Support portal on Zendesk
footer_description_global_passport: AQUA is your global passport to financial inclusion, designed for Latin America and embraced by Bitcoiners everywhere.
newsletter_disclaimer_recaptcha: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply.
footer_dolphin_card_disclaimer: The Dolphin Visa® Card is issued by our partner Financial Institutions, pursuant to a license from Visa.
features_page_effortless_swaps_descripti: AQUA is the only Bitcoin wallet with easy on-the-fly swaps, allowing users to hold Bitcoin on Layer 2 for quick access to Lightning payments or stablecoins.
features_page_powering_instant_descripti: Whether you're paying a bill or transferring funds across networks, AQUA makes it easy. Send USDt and Bitcoin quickly, securely, and without high transaction fees, no matter where you are
features_page_lightning_on_liquid_descri: Lightning payments in AQUA are fast and cheap, allowing you to pay anyone in the world easily and instantly.
features_page_confidential_bitcoin_liqui: Faster and Confidential Bitcoin on Liquid
Liquid enables fast, low-cost Bitcoin transfers plus confidential transactions ideal for everyday payments.
features_page_send_tether_usdt_title: Send Tether USDt to anyone, anywhere
features_page_send_tether_usdt_descripti: AQUA supports USDt on Liquid, enabling easy transfers on Tron, Ethereum, and more.
features_page_liquid_network_description: Liquid is a sidechain Layer 2 solution that provides faster settlement for Bitcoin, confidential transactions, and the ability to issue stable assets like stablecoins or financial instruments without the need for a native token.
features_page_marketplace_opportunities_: Unlock Bitcoin's full potential with AQUA. Gain instant access to Layer 2 for faster, smarter transactions.
features_page_control_bitcoin_title: Take Full Control of Your Bitcoin
features_page_control_bitcoin_descriptio: With AQUA, you don't just hold your Bitcoin, you use it your way. Swap, spend, or save with tools that make Bitcoin work in your daily life.
features_page_bitcoin_wallet_more_title: The Bitcoin Wallet That Does More
features_page_bitcoin_wallet_more_descri: AQUA is your gateway to Bitcoin-powered services. From payments to powerful integrations, AQUA connects you to the latest in Bitcoin, all in one app.
features_page_shape_marketplace_descript: Want more features, exchanges, or services? We want to hear from you. Send us your suggestions, we're always looking to improve.
faq_does_collect_data: Does AQUA collect any data from its users?
faq_does_collect_data_answer_p1: AQUA doesn't collect personal data or transaction logs. Data might only be shared when using third-party services, such as customer support through Zendesk.
faq_does_collect_data_answer_p2: For more information about AQUA's commitment to privacy, always check out the most recent version of our Privacy Policy.
faq_how_does_aqua_store_seed_answer_p1: AQUA is a non-custodial Bitcoin and Liquid wallet, therefore it is the user's sole responsibility to safeguard access to the funds and the device on which they install AQUA.
faq_how_does_aqua_store_seed_answer_p2: AQUA doesn't store or access seed phrases. They are securely saved on your device using Keychain (iOS) or EncryptedSharedPreferences (Android). Users are fully responsible for safeguarding their recovery phrases.
